refnamediv.refpurpose: Allows the user to set the direction of an edge by specifying a direction vector in the form of x, y, and z components or via rotation and fallback angles.

refsection.para: Allows the user to set the direction of an edge by specifying a direction vector in the form of x, y, and z components or via rotation and fallback angles. This can only be done while moving an edge of an ARB.
The example shows the use of the edgedir command to rotate an edge to be parallel to the y axis.

info.title: Rotate an edge to be parallel to the y axis.

listitem.para: Rotates the edge being edited to be parallel to the y axis.
